author: kimberlybK8155UF
title: Stay at Hilton Garden Inn in Chelsea
text:
Hotel is very clean and staff was very courteous and nice. I frequently stay in the area because of the close proximity to Penn Station and my office.
The gym is not bad for a quick run on the treadmill.
Overall, good value!
